# auAudioUnit

**Instance Property**

An audio unit object that wraps or underlies the implementation’s audio unit.

## Declaration

```swift
var auAudioUnit: AUAudioUnit { get }
```

## Discussion

This provides an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnit] that either wraps or underlies the implementation’s audio unit, depending on how the app packages the audio unit. Apps interact with this to control custom properties, select presets, and change parameters.

Don’t perform operations directly on the audio unit that may conflict with the engine’s state, which includes changing the initialization state, stream formats, channel layouts, or connections to other audio units.

## Getting Audio Node Properties

- **latency**: The processing latency of the node, in seconds.
- **outputPresentationLatency**: The maximum render pipeline latency downstream of the node, in seconds.
